channel.title: Need bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad help!
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to create an auto fighter for runescape 2? The one were they tell you how on scar is really confusing, can someone give me a simple normal autofighter? No food eat, no log out, just one that clicks the color.
I'm using it on the wizard tower lesser demon, with a rune halberd if that helps[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 12:59:52 PM[/size][hr]sorry if I'm leaching, but my runescape char is really poor, I can't afford to give anything away [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Double post [/center]

item.title: Need bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad bad help!
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Like this is the world’s most basic script:program New; begin Writeln('Hi'); end.
But it is still a start.

First to make your first basic script, find a learn what the following functions do:

SendKeys KeyDown KeyUp WriteLn ReadLn ClearDebug; TerminateScript MoveMouse ClickMouse Wait as they’re the most important functions a beginner needs to learn and know.

Read full topic
